thread.title: Turkey publishes decision to donate up to 100,000 tonnes of breadstuff to Syrian people

title: Turkey publishes decision to donate up to 100,000 tonnes of breadstuff to Syrian people
text: March 16, 2018 / 5:23 AM / Updated 3 minutes ago Turkey publishes decision to donate up to 100,000 tonnes of breadstuff to Syrian people Reuters Staff 1 Min Read ISTANBUL (Reuters) - A decision by the Turkish cabinet of ministers to donate up to 100,000 tonnes of breadstuff flour to civilians living in Syria was published in the Official Gazette on Friday. FILE PHOTO: Syrian women and their children wait for food aid in front of an humanitarian aid distrubition center in Syrian border town of Jarablus, Syria, December 13, 2017. REUTERS/Umit Bektas Reporting by Orhan Coskun; Editing by Daren Butler
